author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 21-year-old man was electrocuted in his house in Triplicane when he tried to spit out of the house and came in contact with a live wire on Sunday night. According to police, Badan Das (21), a native of Odisha and his brothers had come to Chennai a few months ago.

He worked on a construction site and lived in Triplicane.

On Sunday, around 10.30 p.m., the trio had dinner and were chatting.

“Badan Das tried to spit out of the window and he held on to an iron rod of the window bar. He accidentally touched a wire and was electrocuted,” said a police source.
title: 21-year-old electrocuted in Chennai
